definitions: in a way that is distinct in outline or detail
shortDefinitions: in way that is distinct in outline or detail

definitions: in a brisk and concise way

examples.text: she replied crisply that there would be little demand for GM crops

definitions: so as to have a firm, dry, brittle texture
shortDefinitions: so as to have firm, dry, brittle texture

definitions: (in relation to dress) formally and neatly

examples.text: he was crisply dressed in a gray suit and white shirt

shortDefinitions: (in relation to dress) formally and neatly
